DOC.detailed_description: A Phase I , Single Centre , Open , Partly Randomised , Crossover Study Healthy Subjects Evaluate AZD5423 Absolute Pulmonary Bioavailability Administered Inhaled via New Dry Powder Inhaler , Turbuhaler , Spira nebulizer I-neb AAD system
